document.full_text: president barack obama promised victims of the deadliest u.s. tornado in 65 years that the federal government would help them rebuild, saying on sunday it was a national tragedy.
document.title: obama vows national response to missouri tornado
lines_and_colors: president barack obama promised victims of the deadliest u.s. tornado in 65 years that the federal government would help them rebuild, saying on sunday it was a national tragedy.
